Package itismeucci.chat.lib

Class Schema

java.lang.Object
itismeucci.chat.lib.Schema
Direct Known Subclasses:
CheckSchema, JoinErrorSchema, JoinSchema, ListUpdateSchema, NotificationSchema, SchemaErrorSchema, SendErrorSchema, SendOkSchema, SignedSchema, StateErrorSchema
public abstract class Schema extends Object
Classe di base per ogni schema JSON di JCSP.
